title: Land for Sale in Katugastota
details:
Located in Mahaiyawa
Probably the highest remaining point in Kandy
Great Panoramic view

300m for Katugasthota main road
15 feet wide road access

Ideal for a private villa or boutique Hotel & tourism purpose

Clear deeds

Land extent - 180 perches
Price Rs 450,000/- per perch (negotiable)

Inspection could be arranged on prior appointment

Please call for more information
